title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Da Nao Huang Gong
synopsis: The series is about the titular character, an intelligent and mischievous pig named G.G. Bond (猪猪侠, meaning "Pig Hero") born with superpowers. He is an orphan under the care and custody of Dr. Mihu, his teacher who enjoys inventing different gadgets.
related_anime: ['Zhu Zhu Xia: Mo Huan Zhu Luo Ji']
